transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Leader ji baat kar rahe hai sir Baki Lakshmi Mill mein?
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Main Anuraag baat kar raha tha Indiamart.com se, senior manager sir. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya.
Executive: Services ke regarding maine aapko connect kiya tha sir. Aapki services ka by lead consumption nahi ho raha tha sir. By lead matlab last week mein aapne ek bhi consume nahi ki hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Itne bulk order mein by lead aa nahi rahi sir.
Customer: Bulk orders mein?
Customer: Haan haan humne minimum 50 quantity ke upar ki by leads provide nahi ki ja rahi sir.
Executive: 15 ya 550?
Customer: 50, 50.
Executive: 50. Dekhiye isme filter aata hai aapke paas bulk lead ka. Aap usko lagakar isko.
Customer: Humko sab pata hai par usme ek bhi by leads provide nahi kar rahe sir.
Executive: Usme show nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Dekhiye maximum maximum by lead jo aapke paas yaha par show ho rahi hai 15 kg ki tin ki requirement hai jo 15 kg matlab jo aapka mainly wo aata hoga. 15 kg ka tin jo aata hai to uski requirement hai baki monthly logo ki monthly bhi requirement hai wo to aap unko consume karo pehle.
Customer: Maine aaj aapke hamare manager se baat ki thi.
Customer: Usne ek by leads provide karai thi na.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To usne kya bataya answer kya diya ki hume bas bhav janne mein interest tha.
Customer: Hume abhi lena nahi hai bolti.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Ground nut oil.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Wo aapke aath saal se customer the sir.
Executive: Achha. Haan aisa jawab aapke aath saal ke customer se mila to hum kaise by list ko.
Executive: Nahi aath saal ke customer wo aisa hai sir wo baki cheeze bhi purchase karte honge na last time se continuously. Aisa nahi aath saal se wo same hi cheez aap unki requirement unhone ya to purchase kar liya hoga. Aisa inquiry ek call aap jo bol rahe ho main agree kar raha hu aapki baat se agree kar raha hu.
Customer: Teen teen teen mahine pehle ki inquiry thi sir.
Executive: Achha. Haan.
Executive: To usko lena hai to bhi bolenge na yaar.
Executive: Haan nahi wo main agree kar raha hu kabhi kabhi by lead mein shayad jyada irritate hokar bhi reply kar deta hai is tarike ke ya fir jo aap bol rahe hain wo main uske sath agree kar raha hu mana nahi. Aap jaise aapki current by lead abhi available hai theek hai usme aap thoda sa jiski GST verified hai ya to aap usko consume karo ya fir jiski monthly requirement dekho yaha ek seller hai jinhone likh rakhi hai monthly requirement hai to aap unko connect karo. Agar unki monthly requirement hai to wo bulk ki hogi ya fir minimum agar retail bhi rehti hai to wo month ke basis pe ek criteria mein wo bulk ki count hogi aapke liye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Har mahine ka bhai ye customer aapke sath jud hi jayega hai na sir? Hmm hmm hmm hmm. To wo cheez hai aap ek baar open kijiye to main dikha bhi deta hu aapko 10 se 20000 ki by lead hai ye. 20000 to I think so bulk hoga 20000 ki by lead hai order value se.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Aur usko transporting kharch mahanga padta hai na sir aise nahi lete.
Executive: Samajh gaye? Nahi to aap ek baar sir ek baar baat to kijiye dekho agar aap consume karke baat nahi karoge to wo ye aapke Gujarat ki hai Ahmedabad ki to waha tak supply nahi kar sakte aap?
Customer: Wo to hum to kar sakte hai.
Executive: Haan to bas to ab aisa nahi na milega ki aap bolo ki sirf Talala se mile to aisa sach sari inquiry sirf wahi se nahi milegi.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Ye all over all over all over India se hai ab isme aisa hai jitni bhi bulk hogi jaha aap deal kar sakte ho to waha aap deal kar lena. Jaha aapka jyada banta hai to aap unko bata dena ki bhai mera rate ye hai aapko agar isme banta hai to aap lo.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Aap unko consume to karo matlab uski us level ka dekho aapne business start kiya hai aap Baki Lakshmi Mill ke naam se deal kar rahe ho. Theek hai ab aapki apni ek brand bhi hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai Swastik ke naam se aap apna brand promote kar rahe ho na sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm. To ye jab baki cities mein available hoga tabhi to log iske liye matlab search out karenge.
Customer: Okay samajh gaya. Tabhi wo dekh payenge samajh gaye na to at least aap unko thoda sa idea bhi de do apne product ka aur agar wo sample basis pe mangate hai to aap unko share karo. Kyunki agar aisi cities mein aapke ek se do distributor ban gaya mainly jiski monthly requirement hai ya jisko price aapka achha suit ho gaya ya achha lag gaya services achhi lagi to wo aapke regular jud jayega to wo city aapki wo business ko contribute karne lagegi samjhe?
Customer: Hmm. Waha par ek regular regular buyer ban jayega wo ye hai. Aap ek baar online online open karenge by lead apni dekho do 20000 ki ek by lead hai. Ek baar aap open kijiye ga.
Customer: Abhi to main thoda sa kaam pe hu sir main dekh lunga theek hai. Kaha ki hai?
Executive: Achha ek to Surat ki hai aapki.
Customer: Theek hai ye aapki by lead hai.
Executive: Ye aapki Surat ki ye to aaj ki by lead hai sir today ki dikha rahi hai.
Customer: Okay samajh gaya.
Executive: Ghante to nahi dikha rahe baki jo inform kar sakta hu. Ab ye do do se teen consume karo aap aur fir isme reverse dekho baki aap mujhe batao. Theek hai na aur daily basis pe by lead at least consume karo kyunki nahi to balance to aapka waste hi ja raha hai.
Customer: Okay. Aap usko at least consume kar karo maximum theek hai na abhi aap ek se do by lead consume kar lijiyega aapne.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko share bhi kar raha hu.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai aap wo turant kijiye.
Customer: Thank you sir theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Customer says bulk order buyleads not available.

- Customer says 8-year-old customer not interested in buying.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to filter bulk leads.

- Executive suggested consuming monthly requirement leads.

- Executive shared current buylead details with the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to check the shared buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, bulk orders, monthly requirement
